message:
SYSTEM: NicolasMayo2018.pdf: Página 67
Conclusion
The SWoT is about interoperability...
▶Standards are converging towards the SWoT
▶The Semantic Web is a machine-interoperability providers
... and the Fog supports decentralization
▶Distribution provides interoperability
▶Many nodes are between IoT devices and the Cloud
speaker: SYSTEM
